name: Swap Roles
description:
We play for an ordinary policeman who has to patrol the night city. Suddenly he receives a noise complaint in one of the hotels and has to check what is going on.You have to explore the old hotel and the mystery of the inhabitants. Use the camera to see the small details that will help the investigation. This is the beginning of our hero's story. What is waiting for him further? Just a party or something more serious?

Features:
- There are no notes.
- It's necessary to be very attentive and check every corner in order to finish the game.
- Puzzles and objectives to solve and get through
